about_the_game:
[Machine translated]

This is a machine translation from Japanese. Please note that there may be unnatural expressions.

[Overview]

A 3D command RPG, a typical command RPG with dungeon exploration as the main focus. It takes about 4 hours to reach the ending, and about 10 hours to enjoy all the elements.

[Worldview]

A story of labyrinth appraisers exploring labyrinths around the world that have been created over thousands of years in a world ruled by rabbits instead of humans.

[system]

It's a light game that combines classic RPG and skill systems, where you create and explore original characters. It is designed so that even users who are not good at RPGs can reach the ending, but after clearing the game, there will be more labyrinths and exploration areas where tough enemies await, so please give it a try.

[Respect! ]

With respect and love for RPGs from the 80's and 90's. I would be happy if you could remember your youth from this game experience. I've hidden some ideas in various places, so try looking for them.

name: RabbitConquest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForece GTX 1060
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: In a world ruled by rabbits instead of humans, this is an adventure story about labyrinth appraisers who get caught up in a conspiracy surrounding a "magic fruit." It's a traditional 3D command RPG that anyone can play through to the ending in about 4 hours.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Hindi
